comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on January 20, 2023, 09:27:14 AM‚ö†Ô∏èWARNING!!!‚ö†Ô∏è IF THIS HAPPENS BITCOIN WILL DUMP HORRIBLY!!!!!!‚úÖ BTC analysis todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1M9SC9MCHjQThis is a YouTube video and I don't trust them. If it was from your end, and you had done the homework (analysis) on your own, then I would ask you to explain your method and after that, compare it to mine in order to get the best result and get a prediction on how it should be. YouTube is a free platform and people are sharing their own thoughts. So never expect it to go smooth all the time. DYOR and make sure that you can depend on it. If you can, avoid these free services at all cost. Newbies fall for these kinds of traps and make trades based on this. And for that reason, they make losses while those spreading these news making profits, doing the opposite. And you can confirm that by listening to what the YouTubers are saying. They will always give you one prediction and then say that it might go the other way. So they can keep their hands clean and manipulate you. Honestly saying, try to avoid this. Sharpen your skills, try to do it on your own.

comments.author: Hamphser
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on January 20, 2023, 09:27:14 AM‚ö†Ô∏èWARNING!!!‚ö†Ô∏è IF THIS HAPPENS BITCOIN WILL DUMP HORRIBLY!!!!!!‚úÖ BTC analysis todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1M9SC9MCHjQWe know that Technical analysis is neither a hit or miss and not something t hat 100% you could really rely when it comes to your investment decisions but im not saying that those analysis shows off on the vidarent that good but its not something that you would really be that looking into it 100%.Just to mind off that the market could move out on one trend to another or make up some switch up in a snap without following any indicators or something like that and this is what it makes that really hard to make out conclusions and basing up your investment decision on what you are seeing on what others been showing off.Come to mind that there are really that news and fundamentals which would really be adding up on the pressure but on depending on various conditions too but its not really something that would be effective most of the time.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on January 20, 2023, 09:27:14 AM‚ö†Ô∏èWARNING!!!‚ö†Ô∏è IF THIS HAPPENS BITCOIN WILL DUMP HORRIBLY!!!!!!‚úÖ BTC analysis todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1M9SC9MCHjQYou keep on doing the same thing, sharing links about your Yt account and your analysis without even sharing any information in the OP. Whatever it is, I‚Äôm pretty sure most of the trader here also know where the market is heading. If BTC goes down to level of $19k again and breaks it, most probably we will see the real bottom of this bear market and the worst analysis is that the price of BTC will fall into $10k level again, which many believes that it will happen if the worst support goes break.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Man I am surprised that people still post videos like this when last month the SEC charged a bunch of people with pumps and dumps and other security frauds.I just don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth the liability making a video like this to get 50 cents in YouTube revenue and then someone reports you to the SEC and you end up getting arrested.

comments.author: aylabadia05
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on January 20, 2023, 09:27:14 AM‚ö†Ô∏èWARNING!!!‚ö†Ô∏è IF THIS HAPPENS BITCOIN WILL DUMP HORRIBLY!!!!!!‚úÖ BTC analysis todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1M9SC9MCHjQAs major analysts continue to talk about Bitcoin's movement after a long period of staying below the current price, you try to share this video post.This video was created with a purpose and the main purpose is to make a profit through the minutes that will be watched. The video is 8:33 long and has about 1.2k views. Just imagine how much revenue the account owner will get. We are not uncomfortable with trying to calculate the revenue figures that will be obtained, but what if there are parties who dispute or there are parties who dare to challenge the truth of the content discussed in the video.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: I loved the accent. That's about it. LOLThe dude in the videos is just drawing random lines on the chart with basic understanding of technical analysis (which doesn't work at all by the way) and makes random guesses that usually go both ways so that he can later say "we predicted this" and get more Youtube subscribers and visits. If you look at his videos from a month ago, he was doing exactly this (price may go up or down) then he created another video saying "we predicted this rise".

comments.author: Kgdktac
comments.created_time: January 24, 2023, 04:24:09 PMLast edit: January 25, 2023, 03:12:04 PM by mprep
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on January 20, 2023, 09:27:14 AM‚ö†Ô∏èWARNING!!!‚ö†Ô∏è IF THIS HAPPENS BITCOIN WILL DUMP HORRIBLY!!!!!!‚úÖ BTC analysis todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1M9SC9MCHjQWell the video isn't a bad analysis and neither is it painting a doom and gloom picture for Bitcoin, from the analysis he is expecting a short correction to 19300 (a higher low) then a continuation to the upside... This Scenario is the best possible outcome for Bitcoin price. Myself have a more rooted fear from a macro perspective... Many people don't like red market analysis which is understandable as many are Hodlers, But as speculation goes it is wise to see what the Bulls has got going for them and at the same time understand the Bear's case. There is a death cross on the weekly about to complete which forms the decisive resistance at 24500 to 25000 region. The pull back will come but the question will be how severe, a higher low will have us chasing higher targets of btc price, but a lower low (if the rejection was severe) will mean 10k or below.This link shows a picture of what I'm trying to point out https://twitter.com/Maxtwo10/status/1617915731865370625?t=B2lCeoclmaVGBO-XbUxqiQ&s=19 . also note how the weekly candles is getting smaller as it exhausts into the resistance. All that being said I prefer we bounce to the upside.It seems the dump has commenced already, many traders I think will be trapped on the buy side as they wait for a bounce that may never come. The DXY dollar index is currently sitting on a support after a significant drop, very likely dollar will strengthen from hence.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: pooya87 on January 24, 2023, 03:05:14 PMI loved the accent. That's about it. LOLThe dude in the videos is just drawing random lines on the chart with basic understanding of technical analysis (which doesn't work at all by the way) and makes random guesses that usually go both ways so that he can later say "we predicted this" and get more YouTube subscribers and visits. If you look at his videos from a month ago, he was doing exactly this (price may go up or down) then he created another video saying "we predicted this rise". Spot on, this is exactly what the so-called expert traders on YouTube and Twitter do. In fact, I no longer waste my time watching their videos. Most of the time they are emphasizing viewers to subscribe and like their videos or even sign up through their referral links of different exchanges.The whole point is to just grow the viewership of the channel so that they can earn from it rather than the trading which they claim to be knowing
